name: Ext_R4_StructureMap_gr_typeMode
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.StructureMap.group.typeMode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents StructureMap.group.typeMode from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureMap|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: If this is the default rule set to apply for the source type or this combination of types.
element.comment: `StructureMap.group.typeMode` maps to R5 `StructureMap.group.typeMode`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: If this is the default rule set to apply for the source type or this combination of types.
element.comment: `StructureMap.group.typeMode` maps to R5 `StructureMap.group.typeMode`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: If this is the default rule set to apply for the source type, or this combination of types.
